refnamediv.refpurpose: Writes to a zk variable at i-rate without mixing.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Writes to a zk variable at i-rate without mixing.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: isig -- initializes the value of the zk location.
indx -- points to the zk or za location to which to write.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ziw writes isig into the zk variable specified by indx.
These opcodes are fast, and always check that the index is within the range of zk or za space. If not, an error is reported, 0 is returned, and no writing takes place.
